properties.title: Bad Schinznach
properties.abstract: Hot sulphur springs, like those you might expect to find on Iceland, invite visitors to Bad Schinznach to relax, recuperate and recharge their batteries. Treat yourself to a break away from everyday life to visit the most powerful and finely-balanced sulphur spring in Switzerland.
properties.description:
The first bath house was opened in Bad Schinznach in 1658, attracting visitors to the sulphur spring from near and far. Today, you can still enjoy the beneficial effect of this kind of bathing and simply «switch off».

The AQUARENA fun - a thermal bath world of experience, including grotto slide and 25m cold/hot outside pools, current pool and sunbathing lawn - offers you a stimulating time.

In the THERMI spa - a modern haven of wellness with a unique thermal paradise, sauna area, cocoon-Hammam and range of massage/ cosmetic treatments - you will be pampered as a wellness guest looking for relaxation.
properties.name: Bad Schinznach AG
